ProcessTemplates.Name: JSON file from SFTP to MySQL database INSERT
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process will download a JSON file from an SFTP server and insert the data into a MySQL database table.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"FilePath":{"Value":"\"/test/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path to JSON file on SFTP server."},"FileName":{"Value":"\"contact.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of JSON file containing data to be inserted into database."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"example.org\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server address."},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"user\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user."},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user's password."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"Contact\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of table to be used in MySQL for inserting data into."},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"connectionstring\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Connection string for the MySQL database."}}
